pullRequest.title: Exclude attestations that are too old from being included in blocks
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Ensure we don't create invalid blocks by including attestations that are too old.

commit.message: Exclude attestations that are too old from being included in blocks.

nodes.bodyText: Why do you need to do epoch + 1 here?

commit.message: Apply all slot related restrictions when selecting attestations for a block.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into drop-old-attestations

nodes.bodyText: this says isFalse - so it's not ok? (that's different to what the comment says)
It seems to me that this check makes the notPriorToPreviousEpoch check redundant. Am I missing an edge case?

This made me realize that our getEarliestSlotForProcessing() function is wrong. We should be waiting MIN_ATTESTATION_INCLUSION_DELAY slots until we include an attestation in a block not necessarily one slot.
I think the changes necessary for the comment I made above will affect this test as well.

commit.message: Consider MIN_ATTESTATION_INCLUSION_DELAY when deciding if an attestation can be included in a block.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into drop-old-attestations
